extendedInfo.description: Features:- note down period & calculate it for the next month- track complaints & intensity- take notes- influence the development of the full version with a feedback.v1.6:- increased performance- fixed some issues

reviews.comment: Works great. Simple app to keep track of my periods. Wish there was a spotting option, and a way to change the color of the calendar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Love it!  Only wish I could change the length of period interval, as mine is pretty short.  Maybe it will do it automatically next month. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Meets my needs. Any other symtoms, I add under \'notes\'. Helps me keep track of day one, month to month, as I enter perimenopause.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t get it. I could not see where my dates were highlighted, at all. It is so muh eaier to simply put a red circle on a wall calendar...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For just keeping track of ur period, wrks awesome! Can even enter specifics so u hv an idea of wat to xpect. But doesnt keep track of the pill.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the bright pink...it makes me feel better when im moody...& i love Butterflies!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am done having children. I just want to keep track of my cycle and my symptoms so that I can answer my doctor\'s questions. LITE is PERFECT!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ehhh... its okay. It sometimes loses your information which is annoying. HTC hero
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Great way to track your cycle, esp the date your next one might land. Very, test handy at the doctor, when she asks the date your last cycle began :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not adjust period length automatically. Changing period length in settings only shows up after exiting and restarting. Not good for prediction.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I cant even get it ti change legnth on my samsung reflex but on the samsung s the app works fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Okay for what it needs to do. To change number of days in cycle I have to push button, then change back and forth from landscape to portrait.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect app if yu have trouble keeping track of your period. Very simple, yet useful. I love it! HTC evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The calendar days were confusing. Didn\'t really have a lot of option for when you had to take ur pill or for when you were ovulating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s simply, direct to the point, keeps faithful track of your cycle... even when you\'ve off! Deep pink is attractive w/butterfly... a woman soft touch. Four months using this app & still enjoying the benefits!  Appreciate the work that went into this app :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesnt predict next cycles and doesn\'t give enough symptom options
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I tried it quick and this seems to be the only all that allows to record complaints and heaviness if bleeding. Love it, upgraded!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent but...
reviews.comment: Excellent program. Could be more helpful for tracking irregular periods (endo or perimenopause) which is difficult at best, but this program\'s assumption of regular  29 day cycles makes it challenging to track at times. Still, it was the best program I found.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice if it wasnt trying for force me to buy the full verison, uninstalling now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: its ok. does was it needs to if all you want is a period calendar. works fine on Samsung galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User
